oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Optimal packet length scheduling for regulated media streaming
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: KARANDIKAR, ABHAY
SHAH, PA
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: minimax techniques
packet switching
quality of service
telecommunication traffic
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We present, for a prerecorded stream, an algorithm to determine a packet length schedule that is optimal with respect to appropriate measures of distortion and quality smoothness, when the traffic is required to adhere to specified token bucket regulation constraints.
